ComicInfo.Summary:
Monster Day Care: Duncan is sent to a day care for monsters on Monster Island, but the cultural differences between the boy and the monsters means it can't work out.
All the Best Heroes Are...: Belloc sends his astral body to summon Duncan to the scene of where he fought the extraterrestrial robots so he can warn his son about the danger to him. After Belloc's astral form fades, Duncan discovers his father impaled by one of the alien weapons.
ComicInfo.Title: Monster Day Care; All the Best Heroes Are...
